title: Add Discord Chatbot Creator Platform with Suspicious H to Dev_Tools
author: pollinations-ai[bot]

gist.headline: Suspiciously good bots
gist.blurb: A new tool for crafting Discord bots has landed in the Dev Tools section. Design, test, and deploy with 'Suspicious H'.
gist.summary: Added the Discord Chatbot Creator Platform to the community apps showcase.
gist.impact: Developers can now access a dedicated tool for managing Discord bot intents, webhooks, and deployment.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the Bee and the Monitor Robot working on a Discord bot interface. The interface features a pixelated letter 'H' with shifty eyes (the 'Suspicious H'). The scene is a cozy digital workshop.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of Polly the Bee and the Monitor Robot tweaking a pixelated Discord bot interface on a retro screen. A suspicious-looking letter 'H' with eyes appears on a monitor. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi Stardew Valley vibes. Pixel text: 'BOTS'. Emotionally warm and playful.
